basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Streptococcus dysgalatiae subsp dysgalactiae ATCC 27957 (IC50=0.69±0.05 µM), Vancomycin-resistant Enterococcusfaecium CNRZ 481 (IC50=0.84±0.05 µM), Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus C5 (IC50=2.23±0.03 µM), Bacillus anthracis Sterne 7702 (IC50=0.49±0.02 µM), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (IC50=0.55±0.01 µM), Lactococcus lactis HP ATCC 11602 (IC50=0.12±0.09 µM).
